Class Semester

java.lang.Object
Semester
public class Semester extends Object
The `Semester` class represents an academic semester with attributes such as a list of modules, semester number, academic year, total credits, and semester weighting.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Semester(int number, double weighting)
    Constructs a new `Semester` object with the given semester number and weighting.
